pages.text: You had more than enough time to develop your own individual fighting style.$(br)To best support this style, you've designed a range of matching gear out of interesting materials.$(br)Disadvantage: The shards used in the production are kind of brittle. Therefore, this equipment has a comparatively low durability.
The Fetchling Helmet gives attackers a Weakness and Slowness when hit, lets you slip through their claws like a shadow.
The Ferocious Chestplate grants you Absorption and Instant Health when hit, makes you a formidable close combat fighter.
The Sylph Leggings give you a short burst of Speed and Invisibility on hit. Giving you an opportunity to retreat. Perfect for ranged combat.
The Oread Boots give you a short burst of Resistance and Regeneration on hit, making you an massive wall for a short duration.
